key.name: disable-lock-screen
key.description: Set to true to prevent the user from locking the screen.

key.name: disable-printing
key.description: Set to true to prevent the user from printing.

key.name: disable-save-to-disk
key.description: Set to true to prevent the user from saving files to disk.

key.name: some-integer-setting
key.description: This is an example of an integer setting.

key.name: a-string-setting
key.description: This is an example of a string setting.
